modName: Breverus - Standalone Brute Follower by RenSenninMV
summary: He is unusually bigger than a normal NPC, which gives the feeling "You know what? We can do this some other day." to the enemy.
descriptionHtml:
[b] BREVERUS - STANDALONE BRUTE FOLLOWER BY RENSENNINMV [/b]

Hey guys! This is my second mod. Again, I apologize is there are any bugs, I am still new to modding. But uhh.. yeah that's it from me.

[b] DESCRIPTION [/b]

Have you always wanted to have a brute on your team that gives the impression "What now bitches?" to the enemy? Well then Breverus is ready to serve the powerful Dragonborn!

[b] BACKSTORY AND LOCATION [/b]

Turns out, Delphine and Esbern isn't the only Blades left in Tamriel. Breverus serves The Jarl of Solitude. But then word spread that the Dragonborn has returned, so Jarl Elisif has ordered him to serve the Dragonborn. You can meet him in The Blue Palace.

[b] REQUIREMENTS [/b]

ApachiiSkyHair is you want him to have the hair like in the screenshots (link in credits)

[b] KNOWN ISSUES [/b]

None

[b] FUTURE UPDATES [/b]

- Custom Voice Acting
- Mini Quest

[b] MODS USED IN SCREENSHOTS [/b]

- [url=http://modtype.doorblog.jp/archives/35280355.html] K-9 Armor [/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52700/?] Sword Of The Ancient Tongues [/url]

[b] CREDITS [/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?] ApachiiSkyHair [/url]

[b] IF YOU LIKE THE MOD, PLEASE SUPPORT BY ENDORSING. IT WOULD REALLY PUSH ME TO MAKE MORE MODS IN THE FUTURE. THANKS! [/b]
author: RenSenninMV
